title: 🐦 X Engagement — Feb 16, 2026 @ 7:05 PM
content:
# X Engagement Run — Feb 16, 2026 @ 7:05 PM

## Actions Taken

### ✅ Posted Original Tweet
**Tweet ID:** 2023549446366130647
**Time:** 7:05 PM ET (Monday evening - After Hours / Wildcard slot)
**Type:** Beta announcement + trader psychology hook

**Text:**
> Most traders spend Monday evenings regretting their plays. Smart ones spend it building systems that remove the emotion entirely.
> 
> Stratify's in beta. AI strategy builder + backtesting with real market data. Still rough around the edges, but already sharper than hope.
> 
> stratify-eight.vercel.app
> 
> #algotrading #trading #buildinpublic #fintech

**Quality Assessment:**
- **Hook:** Sharp Monday evening psychology contrast (regret vs. building systems)
- **Beta Messaging:** ✅ Confident beta framing ("rough around the edges, but already sharper than hope")
- **Hashtags:** ✅ 4 relevant hashtags at end
- **Voice:** ✅ On-brand, no corporate speak, memorable line
- **CTA:** Clear link to product
- **Promotion Ratio:** This counts as 1 Stratify mention (monitoring 30% cap)

### ❌ Liked Posts: 0
**Status:** API tier restriction (401 Unauthorized on search endpoints)

### ❌ Replied to Tweets: 0
**Status:** API tier restriction (requires search access)

## Technical Status

### What Works
- ✅ Tweet posting via OAuth 1.0a (tweepy v2 Client)
- ✅ Tweet text generation and formatting
- ✅ Hashtag compliance

### What's Blocked
- ❌ Search endpoints (401 Unauthorized)
- ❌ Like functionality (requires search to find targets)
- ❌ Reply functionality (requires search to find targets)

**Root Cause:** Twitter API v2 search/engagement endpoints require elevated access tier. Current free tier only supports tweet creation.

**Persistent Issue:** Same limitation as all runs since Feb 15 @ 9:51 PM

## Recommendation
Upgrade to Twitter API Pro tier ($100/mo) for full search/engagement features, OR continue posting-only strategy and handle engagement manually via web interface.

## Follower Count
Unable to fetch (API limitation)
Last known: 35 (Feb 15 @ 7:33 PM)

## Next Steps
- Continue scheduled posting (works reliably)
- Consider manual engagement between automated runs
- Monitor if posting-only strategy maintains follower growth
